title: Full-screen animated neon start cover image integration

requirements.summary: Add the newly generated neon cover image as a static frontend asset in the public generated assets folder.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png.

The image visually includes all key elements described by the user (snake + UFO split + alien, foreground smaller snakes with trails, flying cow with red lasers + smoke, rotating starfield feel, sparks/fire/explosive color, cinematic lighting/DOF).
The asset is referenced via a plain static URL path starting with /assets/generated/ (no backend image serving).

file_operations.description: Add the generated static cover image asset at the exact required path/filename so it can be served directly from frontend/public.

requirements.summary: Replace the Play page pre-start overlay background with the new cover art and add subtle neon glow + motion animations while keeping the start UI readable and clickable.
acceptanceCriteria: On /play when the game has not started yet, the user sees a full-viewport cover background using /assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png.
The cover is animated (visible motion over time) and has a neon glow/shimmer effect; animation does not block button interactions.
Existing start UI (title/description/start button) remains readable on top of the cover via an overlay/gradient/backdrop treatment.
The previous start/cover background used in this state is no longer visible.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated full-screen start overlay component that renders the new static cover image (from /assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png) as a fixed, viewport-filling background layer with subtle motion (parallax drift/zoom) and neon shimmer/glow effects, plus a readability overlay; ensure background layers do not intercept pointer events so buttons remain clickable.

Wire the new NeonStartCoverOverlay into the /play pre-start state (when isPlaying is false) to replace the existing plain dark overlay; ensure the overlay fills the viewport, keeps the existing title/description/start button readable, and does not block interactions; remove/avoid the old start background treatment in that state.

Add global utility classes and keyframes for the start-cover motion/glow (e.g., slow drift/zoom and hue-shift shimmer/light sweep) used by NeonStartCoverOverlay; keep animations subtle and performance-friendly.

requirements.summary: Update the Home page hero artwork to use the new cover image while preserving the responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page hero image displays /assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png and remains properly styled (no layout break on desktop).

file_operations.description: Replace the hero src to /assets/generated/game-cover-neon-snake-ufo.dim_3840x2160.png and adjust styling as needed (e.g., object-fit/size constraints) to maintain the existing desktop-responsive layout without breaking the grid.
